data.body:
breakdown should open in Direct view with a prefilled prompted and the run button clicked, to automate from beat creation to a fully fleshed out hierarchical set of beads.  This is true when it is run from the Create dialog or in the Beat detail lightbox.

The breakdown view should be removed entirely and the action should simply redirect to Direct, populate the prompt, and execute it automatically.
